Material used.Description: Inducible model in PC12/TetOn cells expressing WT or A30P alpha-synuclein

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed increased aggregation and toxicity compared to WT under 3-MA and MG132 treatments
Wild-type alpha-synuclein exhibited lower aggregation and maintained antioxidant function

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal readout defined by absence of aggregation and maintained antioxidant function

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Abnormal readout defined by increased aggregation and reduced antioxidant function
